channel.title: jekyll update on r2ys blog
channel.description: Recent content in jekyll update on r2ys blog

item.title: How to install jykell on mac!
item.description: 如何在mac上安装jykell 1.安装rvm curl -L get.rvm.io | bash -s stable source ~/.rvm/scripts/rvm rvm -v 2.安装ruby rvm install 2.6.0 rvm list 3.安装jykell gem source gem install jekyll jekyll -version 4.安装bundle gem install bundle 运行bundle，安装Gemfile里的插件 bundle install 5.初始化web项目 jekyll new r2ys-site cd r2ys-site/ 6.本地localhost:4000测试 jekyll serve jekyll serve --watch --baseurl '/blog' 7.内容生成 jekyll build You’ll find this post in your _posts directory. Go ahead and edit it and re-build the site to see your changes.
